data.name: VR Another World
data.detailed_description:
NEW GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1706100/_/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1687400/Pixie_Farm_VR__VR/


About the Game

This is a walking simulation software for VR.
You can freely walk around the medieval European style world.
There are no game elements at all, and you can enjoy all the elements in as little as five minutes.

■How to move
There are two ways to move: warp mode, which is very sickness-free, and smooth mode, which increases the sense of immersion.
You can also jump by holding both hands at the same time. You can jump infinitely and continuously.

■Miniature Mode
A miniature mode has been implemented that allows you to observe the entire map at 1/100 scale.

■BGM
A total of six types of BGM are available to match the map, and can be changed freely.

data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
